Description.Name: Amid
Description.Details: The self-proclaimed khan of clan Cocaaaaiiiiine Flamingo (spelling important), Anealius Mortimer Ignatius Datelion looks like he should be from a Magistracy pleasure cruise. In point of fact, this perpetually medicated mercenary hails from the Tortuga Dominions and specializes in mocking clanners. While he has had some success leading mercenary companies against them he is currently a free agent on account of a disagreement in leadership qualities. Various substances in his bloodstream unfortunately means he is better suited to support roles, at which he is somewhat proficient. SPECIAL AFFINITY WITH CICADAS NO PASSIVE ABILITIES HE JUST LIKES THEM.
